EmailTemplate.name: UFR ATR PO Mismatch COMM
EmailTemplate.subject: ATR Standard Price funding mismatch PO#: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} , Notification #: {!Case.Case_OwnerId_After_Close__c}, Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above.
We apologize for the delay, as we are unable to complete your request until we receive the information outlined below.
In order to proceed with induction of your unit, please click on the link provided to review the Standard Price for your repair. The link will take you to the portal where you will login; however,after login you will be taken straight to your order approval. Once approved, your order will be released to the shop floor to be repaired. Click here to navigate to portal for Approve or Reject.
Please note that in case of no response, your unit will be automatically returned in “as is” condition (RAI) after 10 calendar days.
We're looking forward to going to work for you.
If you can't locate the information we sent, or you have any questions, or if this inquiry relates to AOG please contact me directly at 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099.
Thank you, we appreciate your business! Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
Utilization of standard prices on your purchase order indicates your acceptance of Honeywell’s Repair and Overhaul Terms and Conditions.
{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
